留言內容: I got the yellow and the grey one. I love them both, very comfy material, more like a guys size small than a ladies size small, but I like that so it isn't tight. Yellow was much duller than in the picture but still looks good. Sleeves were sewn into the folded position at top and bottom. They kind of fall out on the sides so I'd have to add more stitches.

商品名稱: 女款 花卉 T 恤 野花圖案 T 恤 夏日花卉 休閒 寬鬆 上衣 圓領 短袖 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 淺藍色
留言內容: 5'5"215LBSize ordered: 2xlBought shirt because I liked the blue and like floral shirts.Cons:  Shirt did not look as a 2xl or fit as one. I am broad shouldered. Shirt was tight and gripped me tight. Definitely would need a Size up as the chest portion of Shirt was tight as well and length of it was too short if I would reach up even a smidge. G9 size up if you are larger up top.My shirt was not really soft, I know  others commented and it was advertised as super soft. The shirt I received did not stretch well. Also, the floral design is not a graphic design printed on the shirt but made onto the shirt. Over time it will wear. (Picture shown of close up of floral). I try not to get shirts with designs like that so they don't wear off in wash.Pro: Bright blue, so pretty. Floral design is nice. Whether this is bought for yar round or just for spring, people who keep it will have a colorful top. Sleeves are a little loose cuff which is kind of cute. I can see this paired as a casual dress down option or dressed up. It can go with lots of different bottoms, making it a nice piece to have in your closet.
